events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and the resume looks promising with relevant experience.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to their background in software development and engineering skills.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's hiring process within the Engineering department.
The recruiter completed the initial screening call with the candidate and found their communication skills and technical knowledge meet our requirements.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening feedback and expressed strong interest in moving forward with the technical interview process.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 15th at 2 PM to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
